banner.content: Love programming and turn ideas into reality. Curious about every details in computer science. Try different ways to slove problem when facing challenges.

about: I have been self-learning programming for two years. I am proficient in using popular React and Vue frameworks and have developed a complete website useing Express and MongoDB.

description.title: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

metafame.header: 是一個區塊鏈的專案，主要由我和一位後端開發
metafame.content:
我主要負責 Staking、NFT 頁面切版及前端網頁跟區塊鏈的智能合約交互，做出質押還有 NFT 盲盒的功能，使用的是 Next.js & Ethers.js 開發，並且加入 TypeScript 減少 Bug 及降低維護成本

依據客戶的需求，開發客製化的 NFT 角色販售，以及後續的 NFT 升級、抽獎、衣櫃功能。並且與美術配合使用 Spine 播放開箱、升級動畫，使用 SketchFab 展示 NFT 3D 角色模型

velhalla.header: 是一個區塊鏈的專案，主要由我與另一個資深的前輩兩個人一起摸索區塊鏈、​開發、測試、 重構
velhalla.content:
我主要負責 Stake、Comic 頁面切版及前端網頁跟區塊鏈的智能合約交互，做出質押還有 NFT 卡片蒐集​五換一的功能，使用的是 Next.js & Web3.js 開發

這是我第一次學習區塊鏈的相關知識，區塊鏈的智能合約在前端就像是跟一個沒有那麼穩定的後端串 API，因此很多 UI & UX 上的問題要特別細心處理。

music.header: 是我為了熟悉 Vue 3 嘗試寫的作品
music.content:
透過 Vue CLI 4 & Vuex & Tailwind CSS 開發，並串接 Firebase Database

透過這個作品的練習，我更熟悉 Vue 3 的開發模式，並且也藉此機會嘗試看看 Firebase

stores.content:
I developing this websites at my last work, because I was working in a hardware store then. And learn Vue & Vuex in my free time.
That's why I can develop this websites from the point of the users. It has a complete CMS that you can check all products and orders at PC and mobile device.

emaily.header: is a app that can send email survey to your users and collect their feedback.
emaily.content:
In front-end, I build with React and Redux.
And use Express and MongoDB to build database server.
It's a good experience to learn about how AJAX works in server.

maskmap.header: could find masks close to your house or work
maskmap.content:
when people built maskmap in Taiwan, they usually use OSM and Leaflet. But I want to try the original Google Maps API , becsuse its UI and API are beautiful and interesting.
In this time, I've learned a lot of how to use Google Maps API .

success.title: Success !
success.description: I have already received your reply
success.content: and will get back to you shortly

warning.title: Oops !
warning.content: Please wait for moment and try again on sending email
